name: Blackout (itch) (Introware Studios)
description:
Upon abandoning your previous life, you find your past has finally caught up to you. Your world has gone dark, and you aren't alone. You must use your eyes to navigate across dark environments and uncover the truth of the Meyer City Prison. You can't escape your inner demons.

This 30+ minute retro horror story is sure to give you chills. Use your eyes as a tool to find your way through the dark. Play at your own risk.

Please enjoy the game! For more information, visit introwarestudios.com

This game uses Direct3D 11. If you are not using Direct3D 11, you still might not encounter any graphical errors. However, if you encounter any sort of visual errors, this is why. So use Direct3D 11 for the fullest experience!

You can also support the studio by donating via Patreon:  https://www.patreon.com/IntrowareStudios
